title: Blender Lighting Tutorial for 3D Beginners - Learn how to Light

media:group.media:title: Blender Lighting Tutorial for 3D Beginners - Learn how to Light
media:group.media:description:
If you want to learn Blender, check out our Blender courses!
Introduction to Blender for Beginners
https://flippednormals.com/downloads/introduction-to-blender-2-8/

Switching to Blender for Experienced Artists
https://flippednormals.com/downloads/switching-to-blender-for-experienced-artists/

In this Blender lighting tutorial, you'll learn how the different kinds of lights work as well as how to set up an HDRI. We're covering spot lights, sun light, area lights, point lights and HDRI setup.

Monkey Sculpture Model
https://www.myminifactory.com/object/3d-print-monkey-with-skull-148312
